1f0343d57ddddec5182b7c56b0a6b77663c5bdf4e9a448e221cd3","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://041ffdd5c08dd5dd52a82a79f82e62798f1c95aa47bb2ef7eae927dc929671cc","dweb:/ipfs/QmbYck9mEYchBHkjxYaVzzaAwHN5zoqzEZMEPnnRuLs7MN"]},"src/interfaces/ISuperDCATrade.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7f0c6f89a07088afd7985f7afd89b2364c838cf95659c46adf5626abd6c9bbd9","license":"AGPLv3","urls":["bzz-raw://11683009fac7ea51f06e5d88311b74ed2261ee6698d817bbbc9f4af927b3dcd2","dweb:/ipfs/QmdTEN8mt2bk4RWfPWESkgc48GCqgArPigmtM7NcJrTVdh"]}},"version":1}

params.tradeId: The trade ID to claim cashback for

returns.totalCashback: The total amount of cashback claimed

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns.claimable: Amount that can be claimed from completed epochs (USDC 6 decimals)
returns.claimed: Amount already claimed for this trade (USDC 6 decimals)
returns.pending: Amount pending in the current incomplete epoch (USDC 6 decimals)

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw
params.to: The address to send the tokens to
params.token: The token contract address to withdraw

USDC().notice: The USDC token used for cashback payments

cashbackClaim().notice: The single cashback claim configuration for this contract

claimAllCashback(uint256).notice: Claim all available cashback for a trade

claimedAmounts(uint256).notice: Mapping of tradeId to total claimed amount in USDC (6 decimals)

getCashbackClaim().notice: Get information about the cashback claim configuration

getTradeStatus(uint256).notice: Get trade cashback status showing claimable, pending, and claimed amounts

withdrawTokens(address,address,uint256).notice: Withdraw any ERC20 token from the contract
